definition: A protein that modulates the frequency, rate or extent of cytoplasmic translation.
selection_criteria: it modulates the rate or extent of cytoplasmic translation
referents: Heterogeneous nuclear ribonucleoprotein U (C1orf199, HNRPU, SAFA, U21.1)
Protein lin-28 homolog A (CSDD1, LIN28, ZCCHC1)
Pyruvate kinase PKM (OIP3, PK2, PK3, PKM2)
Insulin-like growth factor 2 mRNA-binding protein 1 (CRDBP, VICKZ1, ZBP1)
ATP-dependent DNA/RNA helicase DHX36 (DDX36, KIAA1488, MLEL1, RHAU)
RING finger protein unkempt homolog (KIAA1753, ZC3H5, ZC3HDC5)
CCHC-type zinc finger nucleic acid binding protein (RNF163, ZNF9)
Cold shock domain-containing protein E1 (D1S155E, KIAA0885, NRU, UNR)
Serine/threonine-protein kinase mTOR (FRAP, FRAP1, FRAP2, RAFT1, RAPT1)
ATP-dependent RNA helicase A (DDX9, LKP, NDH2)
